articles.description: Indian Oil, among other oil refining companies in India, benefited from discounted Russian crude and significant inventory gains in Q2, offsetting the impact of unchanged retail prices of petrol and diesel.
articles.content:
Indian Oil Corporation on October 31 reported its fiscal second quarter net profit at Rs 12,967 crore, swinging into green from a net loss of Rs 272 crore a year ago.
